item.title: Using .NET Aspire With the Docker Publisher
item.description: A practical walkthrough of using .NET Aspire's Docker publisher to generate Docker Compose files from C# code. Learn how to set up an API with Postgres and Redis, publish to Docker Compose, and deploy to a VPS with minimal configuration. Link to article: https://www.milanjovanovic.tech/blog/using-dotnet-aspire-with-the-docker-publisher
